summary.span: 包含用于实现 STL/CLR 库的泛型接口的类、接口和迭代器。

span.span: Contains the classes, interfaces, and iterators that are used to implement the generic interface to the STL/CLR Library.

summary.span: 通过使用此泛型接口，其他 .NET 语言（如 C# 和 Visual Basic）可以调用使用 STL/CLR 编写的代码。

span.span: By using this generic interface, other .NET languages, such as C# and Visual Basic, can call code that is written using STL/CLR.
